skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy.

Has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn if the target's HP percentage is lower than this Champion's.
skills.name: Thunderous Whallop

skills.desc:
Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
Grants an Extra Turn.
skills.name: Hold Fast

skills.desc: Places a [Veil] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns.
skills.name: Covered Retreat
